name: Loading screen simulator 2019
description:
Simulation of a loading screen!

Very perfectly accurate and detailed simulation,

All factors that add to loading screens are simulated with incredible detail here in this modern instalment of the series

Can you loading screen? We will see!

Made for GBTK Jam 6.

oh no i'm stuck ._. (at the loading screen)

Note: The game is completable. To complete it, you must click a button that says "Complete game"
